name: Smoked Trout "Pâté"
description: Smoked trout is a criminally underreported ingredient in my book. Smoked salmon gets all kinds of attention, in its cold-smoked form as the centerpiece of bagels, but the humble trout has no one to sing its praises. It's always found...
recipeIngredient: 10 ounces smoked trout fillet, skin and bones removed

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the fillets with the cream cheese and lemon juice. Season to taste (the trout will already be somewhat salty).
Add a pinch of cayenne, if desired and to taste. Serve on crackers or toast.
